description: Terminals is a secure, multi tab terminal services/remote desktop client. It uses Terminal Services ActiveX Client (mstscax.dll). Supported protocols: Windows remote desktop (RDP), VNC, VMRC. SSH, Telnet, RAS, ICA, Citrix, HTTP and HTTPs based viewers.
summary: This is a official Terminals msi installer package.
author: jirkapok rob.chartier
